dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: A dangerous repeat offender, a Kazakh citizen, was just extradited from Armenia back to Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A dangerous repeat offender, a Kazakh citizen, was just extradited from Armenia back to Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Armenia has extradited a dangerous repeat offender to Kazakhstan who is suspected of attempted murder, according to the General Prosecutor's Office. In September 2024, the man, a Kazakh citizen with multiple prior convictions, allegedly attacked another man in Petropavlovsk while intoxicated.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, this guy is uh, suspected of attempted murder in Petropavlovsk back in September 2024.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, this guy is uh, suspected of attempted murder in Petropavlovsk back in September twenty twenty four.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In September 2024, the man, a Kazakh citizen with multiple prior convictions, allegedly attacked another man in Petropavlovsk while intoxicated.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And he did it while intoxicated, acting out of hooligan motives—stabbed the victim multiple times in vital organs.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And he did it while intoxicated, acting out of hooligan motives-stabbed the victim multiple times in vital organs.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Acting out of hooligan motives, he inflicted multiple stab wounds to the victim's vital organs.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It's incredible the victim survived, honestly. Urgent medical care saved his life.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's incredible the victim survived, honestly. Urgent medical care saved his life.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The victim survived thanks to urgent medical care.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: After the attack, the suspect just fled, and ended up on an international wanted list.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: After the attack, the suspect just fled, and ended up on an international wanted list.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: After committing the crime, the suspect fled and was placed on an international wanted list.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And he was arrested in Armenia just a month later, in October. Pretty quick work.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And he was arrested in Armenia just a month later, in October. Pretty quick work.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: He was arrested in Armenia in October of the same year.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Now he's back in Kazakhstan, held in a pre-trial detention facility.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Now he's back in Kazakhstan, held in a pre-trial detention facility.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The suspect is currently being held in a pre-trial detention facility.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And if convicted, he could face 15 to 20 years… or even life imprisonment with property confiscation.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And if convicted, he could face fifteen to twenty years... or even life imprisonment with property confiscation.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: If convicted, he faces 15 to 20 years in prison or life imprisonment with confiscation of property.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: That's a serious sentence, but given his prior convictions, it makes sense.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's a serious sentence, but given his prior convictions, it makes sense.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It's interesting—this isn't the first time Kazakhstan has extradited someone from abroad recently.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's interesting-this isn't the first time Kazakhstan has extradited someone from abroad recently.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Previously, a Kazakhstani national wanted internationally was extradited from Russia to Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right, like that other national who was extradited from Russia not long ago.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, like that other national who was extradited from Russia not long ago.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Previously, a Kazakhstani national wanted internationally was extradited from Russia to Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Cross-border cooperation seems to be working, at least in these cases.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Cross-border cooperation seems to be working, at least in these cases.
